change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "receipt" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 262/2020, effective September 20, 2020.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: receipt means a receipt issued under section 20 of the Income Tax Act by a financial agent for a registered political party, registered constituency association or candidate.

change.changenote: Section 2 (2) (e) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 262/2020, effective September 20, 2020.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the name and address of the person making the political contribution including, in the case of an individual, the given names of the individual;

change.changenote: Section 3 (1) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 262/2020, effective September 20, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A receipt is not valid for the purposes of section 20 of the Income Tax Act

change.changenote: Section 4 (1) (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 262/2020, effective September 20, 2020.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the original must be provided to the taxpayer for attachment to the taxpayer's tax return;

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 262/2020, effective September 20, 2020.

bcl:section.bcl:text: A receipt for an eligible political contribution by the spouse of a taxpayer may be used by the taxpayer as an eligible political contribution of the taxpayer.
